svg.aria-label: Voidline AI mastering console — cinematic scenes

g.text: Welcome, producer. Advanced AI is calibrated and ready to analyze your audio.
Upload a track to begin mastering and unlock its full sonic potential.
[ALERT] Solar flare activity detected — uplink integrity at 98%.
Tip: Drag & drop to acquire signal lock. Status auto-updates appear here.
Phases of the AI mastering process
[10:24:03] Loader: Scanned 2,184 frames • peak -2.3 dBFS • LUFS -14.2 • crest 10.8 dB
[10:24:06] Stage: Transient shaping applied • SNR +3.1 dB • stereo spread +6%
[10:24:10] Output: True-peak limiter armed • ceiling -0.9 dBTP • dithering TPDF 16-bit
